Name: Deakin
Description:
The Division of Deakin consists of:

  • part of the Manningham City Council,
  • part of the Maroondah City Council, and
  • part of the Whitehorse City Council.
ProductsAndIndustry: Light manufacturing, commercial and retail industries, and education.
NameDerivation: Named in honour of the Hon. Alfred Deakin, 1856-1919. Deakin was an active member of the Constitutional Conventions that led to the Commonwealth of Australia, Prime Minister of Australia (1903-04, 1905-08 and 1909-10) and a Member of the House of Representatives (1901-13).
Members:
• Sukkar, M (LP) 2013-
  • Symon, M (ALP) 2007-2013
  • Barresi, P (LP) 1996-2007
  • Aldred, K J (LP) 1990-1996
  • Beale, J H (LP) 1984-1990
  • Saunderson, J (ALP) 1983-1984
  • Jarman, A W (LP) 1966-1983
  • Davis, F J (LP) 1949-1966
  • Hutchinson, W J (LP) 1937-1949
DemographicRating: Outer Metropolitan - situated in capital cities and containing large areas of recent suburban expansion.
